name: SperderMerns Pizza Tehrm
description:
With Marvel having confirmed the exsistence of the multiverse then whos to say there isnt a universe where Spiderman is a successful pizza delivery person with no villains to worry about, well you can find out what it is like to do just that in this universe you are Sperdermern and you swing through this hand crafted city holding onto a pizza box and delivering it to the rooftops. deliver as many as you can before your shift is over... he also cant climb walls... and theres no sound but other thn that this game is heaps of fun... once you get the hang of it.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=71850723

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pickledsquid_games/
